item.title: Why DataCamp Works Well for Teachers
item.description: “I didn’t start with the courage and confidence. I started with the risk.”   Laura Davies (British golfer)   The tech world is a huge world and there is so much advice out there.

item.title: Getting Started with LinkedIn
item.description: “There’s something delicious about writing those first few words of a story. You can never quite tell where they will take you.

item.title: About
item.description: I was a classroom teacher and am working on transitioning into the tech industry. I’m documenting my experience for others who are making the same transition.
